events.content: I'll analyze the Stripe homepage and create a pixel-perfect clone. Let me start by examining the page structure and design elements.

events.result: Successfully analyzed page layout. Found 6 main sections: Hero, Features, Products, Developers, Enterprise, Footer.

events.content: The page has 6 distinct sections. I'll spawn workers to build each section in parallel for faster generation.
